item.title: The two most important functions for data visualisation in R
item.description: In my opinion, the two most important functions for data visualisation in R are Par and Pairs functions. Par Function The first function is par function with mfrow parameter. The par(mfrow=c(rows,columns)) allows us to plot multiple plots on the same page or window. Below an example with IRIS dataset.
